meta.title: GROVYN | 现代企业软件工程
meta.description: Grovyn 是一家专注于 Web、移动端和后端解决方案的软件工程公司。

hero.subtitle: Grovyn 为全球企业构建生产级软件系统，注重可靠性、性能与长期可维护性——从架构到部署。

solutions_menu.industries_desc: 医疗、金融科技、电商等领域的专属工程能力。

infrastructure_menu.featured_desc: 与我们的团队无缝迁移至云端。零停机保证。

menus.ai_desc: 前沿 AI 智能体与生成式 AI 解决方案。

right.description: 持续监控与更新，保持系统处于最佳性能。

metrics.title: Grovyn 新一代工程倡议
metrics.subtitle: 以精准、可靠与长期愿景打造的生产级系统。我们优先考虑可扩展架构与高性能交付，助力您的增长。
metrics.ownership: 完全所有权，无供应商锁定

testimonials.title: 获长期建设团队的信任
testimonials.subtitle: 企业团队依赖 Grovyn 交付安全、可靠、规模化稳定运行的系统。

contact.subtitle: 与资深工程师直接沟通，评估架构、可行性与下一项倡议的执行策略。
contact.confidential_desc: 在严格隐私协议下的安全咨询。
contact.nda_desc: 标准或定制协议保护您的知识产权。
contact.no_sales_desc: 直接与构建您产品的工程师对话。
contact.your_info_sub: 帮助我们了解您的背景
contact.brief_placeholder: 简要说明技术需求或挑战...
contact.success_message: 我们的工程团队将审阅您的需求，并在 24 小时内联系安排深度沟通。

footer.tagline: 下一代数字产品的工程实践。从大规模云平台到无缝移动体验。

about.subtitle: 而设计。Grovyn 是专注为全球企业解决复杂架构挑战的高绩效工程团队。
about.philosophy_desc: 我们不仅交付功能，更构建系统。我们优先减少技术债、可观测架构与以用户为中心的流程。
about.clean_code_desc: 可维护、同行评审、有文档。
about.cloud_native_desc: 为 AWS、Azure、GCP 可靠性而构建。
about.zero_latency_desc: 为全球用户优化的响应时间。
about.principles: 驱动。我们的核心运营原则
about.transparency_desc: 通过工程仪表板实时查看项目。
about.reliability_desc: 为承受全球峰值流量而设计的容错系统。
about.user_flow_desc: 连接代码与用户意图的无缝 UX 工程。
about.cta_subtitle: 今天就与我们的架构师安排深度会议，一起规划项目路径。

careers.subtitle: 而建。Grovyn 是高绩效团队，寻找既关心「做什么」也关心「怎么做」的工程师。
careers.culture_subtitle: 我们打造的文化优先深度工作、高度自主与彻底信任。无历史包袱，只有前瞻工程。
careers.remote_desc: 以贡献衡量，不以打卡。随处工作，由高保真异步工具支持。
careers.rhythm_desc: 专注工程胜过疲惫。我们保护您的深度工作时段。
careers.agency_desc: 小团队，大架构影响。我们招的是负责人。
careers.trust_desc: 默认开放路线图与开放沟通。
careers.no_fit: 没有合适岗位？我们始终欢迎卓越人才。
careers.form_subtitle: 填写下方技术简介。我们关心您的项目、架构偏好与大规模系统愿景。
careers.technical_brief_placeholder: 简要突出技术成果或最强作品链接...
careers.success_message: 我们的工程负责人正在审阅您的资料，48 小时内将联系您进行技术深度沟通。

items.title: 快速交付，不打折扣
items.description: MVP 通常数周内上线，而非数月。速度来自经验、清晰决策和扎实基础。

items.title: 透明、固定报价
items.description: 每个项目事先明确交付物和时间表。无隐性成本或隐藏依赖。

items.title: 默认生产就绪
items.description: 每次构建都包含测试、代码审查、文档和部署就绪。

items.title: 完全所有权，无锁定
items.description: 从第一天起您拥有代码。标准技术，无专有框架或供应商依赖。

items.title: 全球交付，周到执行
items.description: 我们跨地区、跨时区工作，沟通清晰、执行可靠。

items.title: 90 天质量保证
items.description: 上线后支持修复问题、确保稳定并优化性能。我们对自己构建的产品负责。

technology_stack.title: 采用现代、成熟的技术构建

ai_section.para1: 在 GROVYN，人工智能不是独立产品，而是融入平台的能力，在智能创造真实运营价值的地方发挥作用。
ai_section.para2: 我们设计的系统融合自动化、机器学习和数据驱动决策，同时保持可靠、可解释和长期可维护。

free_quote_cta.subtitle: 提交项目需求，24 小时内获得带固定价格的详细技术方案。无义务，只求清晰。
free_quote_cta.hint: 预约 20 分钟发现通话 • 24 小时内收到方案

privacy_page.intro: 我们尊重您的隐私并致力于保护您的个人数据。本政策说明我们如何收集、使用和保护您在使用我们网站或服务时的信息。
privacy_page.contact: 如有隐私相关疑问，请通过本网站提供的联系表单或电子邮件与我们联系。

terms_page.intro: 使用我们的网站和服务即表示您同意本条款与条件。我们保留随时更新这些条款的权利。
terms_page.contact: 有关本条款的疑问，请通过本网站提供的联系表单或电子邮件与我们联系。

solutions_industries.hero_subtitle: 为医疗、金融科技、电商等提供定制方案。深厚的领域理解与生产级工程。

projects.title: 精选案例
projects.subtitle: 我们为全球团队交付的项目精选。

cloud.title: Cloud Infrastructure
cloud.subtitle: AWS, Azure & GCP setup, scaling, and optimization. We design and deploy cloud-native solutions that scale with your business and reduce cost.

process_steps.title: Assessment & design
process_steps.desc: Evaluate current infrastructure and define target cloud architecture and security posture.

process_steps.title: Migrate & deploy
process_steps.desc: Zero-downtime migration with phased rollout, validation, and cutover.

process_steps.title: Operate & optimize
process_steps.desc: Ongoing management, FinOps, and continuous performance optimization.

network.title: Network Infrastructure
network.subtitle: LAN, WAN & network design for performance, security, and reliability. From office networks to hybrid cloud connectivity.

process_steps.title: Discovery & design
process_steps.desc: Map current topology, traffic patterns, and define target network architecture.

process_steps.title: Implement & test
process_steps.desc: Deploy with staged rollout, redundancy, and validation under load.

process_steps.title: Monitor & maintain
process_steps.desc: Ongoing monitoring, capacity planning, and security updates.

servers.title: Server Infrastructure
servers.subtitle: On-premise & hybrid server infrastructure. Physical, virtual, and hyperconverged solutions tailored to your workload.

process_steps.title: Requirements & design
process_steps.desc: Workload analysis, sizing, and hybrid/on-prem architecture.

process_steps.title: Deploy & configure
process_steps.desc: Install, configure, and integrate with existing systems.

process_steps.title: Support & evolve
process_steps.desc: Ongoing support, upgrades, and decommissioning when needed.

security.title: Cybersecurity
security.subtitle: Security audits, compliance, and protection. Identify risks, harden systems, and meet regulatory requirements.

process_steps.title: Assess & scope
process_steps.desc: Identify assets, threats, and compliance requirements.

process_steps.title: Remediate & harden
process_steps.desc: Implement controls, patch gaps, and document policies.

process_steps.title: Monitor & report
process_steps.desc: Ongoing monitoring, incident response, and compliance reporting.

support.title: IT Helpdesk & Support
support.subtitle: 24/7 technical support and helpdesk. Keep your teams productive with responsive, tiered support and clear SLAs.

process_steps.title: Onboard & document
process_steps.desc: Define scope, SLAs, escalation paths, and knowledge base.

process_steps.title: Deliver support
process_steps.desc: Handle incidents, requests, and changes per agreed SLAs.

process_steps.title: Improve & report
process_steps.desc: Regular reviews, trend analysis, and continuous improvement.

backup.title: Backup & DR
backup.subtitle: Disaster recovery and business continuity. Protect data, define RPO/RTO, and ensure you can recover when it matters.

process_steps.title: Assess & design
process_steps.desc: Define RPO/RTO, classify data, and design backup and DR architecture.

process_steps.title: Implement & test
process_steps.desc: Deploy backup and replication; run regular recovery tests.

process_steps.title: Maintain & evolve
process_steps.desc: Monitor backup health, update runbooks, and adapt to changes.

devops.title: DevOps & Automation
devops.subtitle: CI/CD, infrastructure as code, and automation. Ship faster and more reliably with modern tooling and practices.

process_steps.title: Assess & design
process_steps.desc: Map current release process and define target pipelines and IaC strategy.

process_steps.title: Build & automate
process_steps.desc: Implement pipelines, IaC, and deployment automation.

process_steps.title: Operate & iterate
process_steps.desc: Monitor, tune, and evolve pipelines and practices.

datacenter.title: Data Center Design
datacenter.subtitle: Modern data center solutions and design. From colocation to private cloud, we help you plan and operate efficient, resilient facilities.

process_steps.title: Strategy & design
process_steps.desc: Requirements, capacity, and physical/network design.

process_steps.title: Build or migrate
process_steps.desc: Build-out, migration, and integration with existing systems.

process_steps.title: Operate & optimize
process_steps.desc: Day-two operations, capacity, and efficiency improvements.

communication.title: Unified Communication
communication.subtitle: VoIP, collaboration tools, and unified comms. Voice, video, messaging, and integrations in one cohesive platform.

process_steps.title: Requirements & design
process_steps.desc: User needs, integrations, and UC architecture.

process_steps.title: Deploy & integrate
process_steps.desc: Roll out platforms, migrate numbers, and train users.

process_steps.title: Support & evolve
process_steps.desc: Ongoing support, upgrades, and adoption.

migration.title: Cloud Migration
migration.subtitle: Seamless cloud migration with zero downtime. We plan, execute, and validate migrations so your business keeps running.

process_steps.title: Discover & plan
process_steps.desc: Application inventory, dependencies, and migration roadmap.

process_steps.title: Migrate in phases
process_steps.desc: Execute migration waves with validation and rollback plans.

process_steps.title: Optimize & decommission
process_steps.desc: Right-size, optimize cost, and decommission legacy.
